item.title: New methods and assessment approaches in intelligence research
item.description: Maybe you have seen my recent Tweet: Please share this call and contribute to a new Special Issue on "New Methods and Assessment Approaches in Intelligence Research" in the @Jintelligence1, we are guest-editing together with Hülür, @HildePsych, and @pdoebler. More information: https://t.co/PevdPeyRgm pic.twitter.com/Y6hRllQa8m — Ulrich Schroeders (@Navajoc0d3) November 11, 2018 And this is the complete Call for the Special Issue in the Journal of Intelligence Dear Colleagues, Our understanding of intelligence has been—and still is—significantly influenced by the development and application of new computational and statistical methods, as well as novel testing procedures.
